Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: NK
Reviews.Content: Worked like it was supposed to and served its purpose. Cant remember why I returned it but I don't believe it was because it didn't function.

Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY ITEM BELONGED TO SOMEONE ELSE
Reviews.Author: SUSAN
Reviews.Content: HAD TO RETURN IT.IT WAS ASSIGNED TO SOMEONE ELSE'S PHONE NUMBER HAD TO RETURN IT BECAUSE THAT WAS THE 3RD PHONE I RECEIVED THAT I HAD BAD LUCK WITH,YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL BECAUSE YOU DON'T REALLY KNOW WHAT YOU ARE GETTING,IT LOOKS GOOD ON THE WEBSITE BUT THEN??...OVERALL ANYTHING ELSE THAT I HAVE ORDERED I HAD A GOOD OUTCOME.
